The BBC is a Global Icon.  It is a symbol abroad of the values of our country.  It is one of the few Globally respected news organisations.  It produces a huge array of quality, original radio & TV output.

Every one of us enjoys watching a BBC TV Program, or listening to a BBC Radio station - Advertisment free.

Why then are the government choking it of resource?
Stop complaining about our national institution, and link the license fee to inflation.
